plot outline: A young girl, the daughter of a wealthy man, falls in love with the neighbourhood boy and they elope just seven days before her 18th birthday. Unable to escape the vigilant eyes of her father's minions, the lovebirds hide within their very own locality, evading their watchful eyes, and hoping to stay uncaught till she turns 18.
title: Baddi Magan Lifeu
plot: A wealthy young girl falls in love with her neighbor and elopes with him just seven days before her eighteenth birthday, as they escape from the eyes of her father's henchmen and manage to stay alive till she turns eighteen.

A young girl, the daughter of a wealthy man, falls in love with the neighbourhood boy and they elope just seven days before her 18th birthday. Unable to escape the vigilant eyes of her father's minions, the lovebirds hide within their very own locality, evading their watchful eyes, and hoping to stay uncaught till she turns 18.

A pair of young lovers, after being caught once by the girl's authoritarian father, decide to elope. They keep under cover, waiting for the girl to turn 18 in a week. Meanwhile, the father, a loan shark, is busy extorting a family, who end up in the midst of the chaos. Will everyone have their happily ever after?::Sunayana Suresh
